misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face from Hirsala Golf, brings a blend of tenacity and charisma to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his thoughtful approach to the game, Okko's presence is always felt, both on and off the course.

Having appeared in the Hector Trophée four times, Okko's experience is an asset to any team. With one coveted Hector Trophée title under his belt, Okko is always a threat to make a deep run in the tournament. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his focus remains steadfast on contributing to his team's success.

Okko's career has not been without its challenges. His struggles with back problems are well-documented, adding another layer to his already inspiring story. Despite these physical setbacks, Okko's dedication to golf remains unwavering. Perhaps the most colorful anecdote associated with Okko is the infamous 'Okkotoberfest,' a term coined after his memorable, shall we say, 'spirited' condition at a past Hector event, showcasing his ability to find levity even in the most competitive environments.
As he gears up for his fifth Hector Trophée appearance in 2025, anticipation is high. Can Okko leverage his experience and passion to once again hoist the Hector Trophée?
